name: Time To Live (itch) (hell, azdaarf)
description:
You play as a rogue AI running out of power, consume more ships to extend your time to live!

WASD - Movement

LMB/Space - Shoot

RMB - Charge/Eject

Shift - Boost

https://i.imgur.com/5ycoW8j.mp4
